titleInfo.title: Mountain Grass '82 at Aunt Minnie's Farm

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Mountain Grass 1982 featuring Jimmy Martin and The Sunny Mountain Boys, J. D. Crowe and The New South, Eddie and Martha Adcock, Mac Bogerty, and many others at Aunt Minnie's Farm on July 23, 24, and 25. Poster features metal photoplates of Jimmy Martin and J. D. Crowe and The New South. Poster was printed for job no. 0221. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20903.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
